item.title: Cleared Hot early access roadmap detailed by dev team
item.content:encoded:
Last month, Not Knowing Software and Microprose confirmed that Cleared Hot was going to be released on November 20th into early access. Today, the development team has released Cleared Hot’s early access roadmap, allowing players to see what content to expect and how updates will be delivered. No dates have been given aside from the release of Chapter 1 through Early Access, as the team will use community feedback to work on improvements before releasing additional content.

Cleared Hot Chapter 1 will give players access to the Texas biome and eight playable helicopters. This will be followed by Chapter 1b, adding side missions, another helicopter, improved controls, and helicopter skins. Chapter 2 is called Into the Jungle which will add the jungle biome, new enemies, and more customisation options for helicopters. This will be followed by Chapter 3, called The Final Chapter, which will see levels in the Arctic and urban areas. The release of Chapter 3 will also add Steam Trading cards and achievements. After that Cleared Hot will get its full 1.0 launch.

Cleared Hot will launch at a price of $14.99, with a 10% launch discount, but the price will rise as more content is added to the game. If you do not know about Cleared Hot, think of it as a new take on classics like Desert Strike and Jungle Strike.

Source: Steam



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/11/17/cleared-hot-early-access-roadmap-detailed-by-dev-team/

item.title: Xbox Partner Preview will be taking place November 20th
item.content:encoded:
The Xbox Partner Preview will be taking place on November 20th at 6pm BST, 10am Pacific / 1pm Eastern, Microsoft has announced today. The show is expected to last around 30 minutes and will have updates from third party developers who will give updates on already announced games, and there will also be some new announcements too.

In the announcement, Microsoft said, “We’re thrilled to announce the next Xbox Partner Preview – our broadcast dedicated to games from third-party partners – is coming this Thursday November 20. We’ll feature a mix of new announcements and game updates, including 007 First Light, Reanimal, Tides of Annihilation, and more, with over a dozen new trailers over the course of around 30 minutes. As always, Xbox Partner Preview is all about sharing exciting game news from our talented partners across the globe. During Xbox Partner Preview, you’ll get multiple world premieres, first looks at gameplay, and updates on other great titles coming to Xbox. Every game you see will be Xbox Play Anywhere, so you can buy once and play on Xbox console, PC and supported handhelds. And many will also be coming to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate on day one.”

You can choose to watch here on using the YouTube video above, or one of the following options.

  • YouTube.com/Xbox
  • Twitch.tv/Xbox
  • Twitch.tv/XboxASL
  • TikTok.com/@Xbox
  • Regional Xbox channels around the world

Source: Microsoft



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/11/17/xbox-partner-preview-will-be-taking-place-november-20th/
